item.title: jQuery插件模板
item.description: 此 jQuery 插件模板出自：jQuery Plugin Boilerplate, revisited // jQuery Plugin Boilerplate // A boilerplate for jumpstarting jQuery plugins development // version 1.1, May 14th, 2011 // by Stefan Gabos // remember to change every instance of "pluginName" to the name of your plugin! (function($) { // here we go! $.pluginName = function(element, options) { // plugin's default options // this is private property and is accessible only from inside the plugin var defaults = { foo: 'bar', // if your plugin is event-driven, you may provide callback capabilities // for its events.
